CD.TITLE: Draft trades to watch: Why the fun could start as high as No. 4
CD.DESCRIPTION: Guard Mike Conley is headed to the Utah Jazz in a trade that sends Grayson Allen, Kyle Korver, Jae Crowder and two draft picks to the Memphis Grizzlies, league sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski.

CD.TITLE: Sources: Bucks trading Snell to Pistons for Leuer
CD.DESCRIPTION: The Bucks are trading guard Tony Snell and the 30th pick in Thursday's NBA draft to the Pistons for forward Jon Leuer, league sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski.

CD.TITLE: Agent: Bucks' Middleton to decline $13M option
CD.DESCRIPTION: I really think technology has done more bad than good at all levels." The world has changed, and it has affected referees from pro to youth sports
